description:
I Must Run! is a skill-based action
running game. Jump across gaps
between prison buildings, run through
an underground station, and test your
reflexes in a deadly dash over building
site cranes. Reach the city centre and
save your wife. Remember, you have
only 24 hours. Let's hope your fitness
levels can cope, because you must
run! Once you have completed story
mode, try to achieve the highest score
in the never-ending run in six available
levels: Prison, Underground, Sewers,
Building Site, Suburbs and Rooftops.
name: I Must Run!
